TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract serializable beforefieldinit CollectionBase extends System.Object implements class System.Collections.ICollection, class System.Collections.IEnumerable, class System.Collections.IList
Public MustInherit Class CollectionBase Implements IList
public ref class CollectionBase abstract : System::Collections::IList
type CollectionBase = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: 提供强类型集合的 基类。

span.span: Provides the base class for a strongly typed collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 建议不要将 `CollectionBase` 类用于新的开发。We don't recommend that you use the `CollectionBase` class for new development. 相反，我们建议使用泛型 类。Instead, we recommend that you use the generic class. 有关详细信息，请参阅 GitHub 上[不应使用非泛型集合](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md)。For more information, see [Non-generic collections shouldn't be used](https://github.com/dotnet/platform-compat/blob/master/docs/DE0006.md) on GitHub. 实例始终是可修改的。A instance is always modifiable. 有关此类的只读版本，请参阅 。See for a read-only version of this class. 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，会根据需要通过重新分配来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required through reallocation. 可以通过显式设置 属性来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

threadsafe.span: 此类型的公共静态（ Visual Basic）成员是线程安全的。

span.span: Public static ( in Visual Basic) members of this type are thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 但不保证所有实例成员都是线程安全的。

span.span: Any instance members are not guaranteed to be thread safe.

threadsafe.span: 此实现不提供 的同步（线程安全）包装器，但派生类可以使用 属性来创建其自己的 同步版本。

span.span: This implementation does not provide a synchronized (thread safe) wrapper for a , but derived classes can create their own synchronized versions of the using the property.

threadsafe.span: 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。

span.span: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure.

threadsafe.span: 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。

span.span: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.

threadsafe.span: 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。

span.span: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.

para.span: 提供此基类是为了使实现者更容易创建强类型的自定义集合。

span.span: This base class is provided to make it easier for implementers to create a strongly typed custom collection.

para.span: 鼓励实现者扩展此基类，而不是自行创建。

span.span: Implementers are encouraged to extend this base class instead of creating their own.

related.span: 执行不区分区域性的字符串操作

span.span: Performing Culture-Insensitive String Operations

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

protected: CollectionBase();

summary.span: 使用默认初始容量初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the default initial capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量就无需在将元素添加到 时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This constructor is an `O(1)` operation.

.method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 capacity) cil managed
Protected Sub New (capacity As Integer)
protected: CollectionBase(int capacity);
new System.Collections.CollectionBase : int -> System.Collections.CollectionBase

param.name: capacity
param.span: 新列表最初可以存储的元素数。

span.span: The number of elements that the new list can initially store.

summary.span: 使用指定的容量初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified capacity.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 的容量是 可以容纳的元素数。The capacity of a is the number of elements that the can hold. 将元素添加到 时，将根据需要通过重新分配内部数组来自动增加容量。As elements are added to a , the capacity is automatically increased as required by reallocating the internal array. 如果集合的大小可为估算值，则指定初始容量就无需在将元素添加到 时执行多个大小调整操作。If the size of the collection can be estimated, specifying the initial capacity eliminates the need to perform a number of resizing operations while adding elements to the . 此构造函数是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 `capacity`的。This constructor is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is `capacity`.

MemberSignature.Value: public int Capacity { get; set; }
.property instance int32 Capacity
Public Property Capacity As Integer
public: property int Capacity { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.Capacity : int with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置 可包含的元素数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of elements that the can contain.
The number of elements that the can contain.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 可存储的元素数。 is the number of elements that the can store. 是实际处于 中的元素的数目。 is the number of elements that are actually in the . 始终大于或等于 。 is always greater than or equal to . 如果在添加元素时 超过 ，则在复制旧元素并添加新元素之前，重新分配内部数组，将自动增加容量。If exceeds while adding elements, the capacity is automatically increased by reallocating the internal array before copying the old elements and adding the new elements. 可以通过显式设置 属性来减少容量。The capacity can be decreased by setting the property explicitly. 如果显式设置了 的值，则还将重新分配内部数组以容纳指定的容量。When the value of is set explicitly, the internal array is also reallocated to accommodate the specified capacity. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作;设置属性是一个 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是新容量。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation; setting the property is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is the new capacity.

exception.span: 已设置为一个小于 的值。

span.span: is set to a value that is less than .

exception.span: 系统上没有足够的可用内存。

span.span: There is not enough memory available on the system.

summary.span: 返回循环访问 实例的枚举器。

span.span: Returns an enumerator that iterates through the instance.
An for the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [Visual Basic， C#][Visual Basic, C#] C# 语言的 `foreach` 语句（在 Visual Basic 中为 `for each`）隐藏了枚举数的复杂性。The `foreach` statement of the C# language (`for each` in Visual Basic) hides the complexity of the enumerators. 因此，建议使用 `foreach`，而不是直接操作枚举数。Therefore, using `foreach` is recommended, instead of directly manipulating the enumerator. 枚举器可用于读取集合中的数据，但不能用于修改基础集合。Enumerators can be used to read the data in the collection, but they cannot be used to modify the underlying collection. 最初，枚举数定位在集合中第一个元素的前面。Initially, the enumerator is positioned before the first element in the collection. 也会将枚举器放回此位置。 also brings the enumerator back to this position. 在此位置，调用 会引发异常。At this position, calling throws an exception. 因此，在读取 的值之前，必须调用 将枚举器向前移动到集合的第一个元素。Therefore, you must call to advance the enumerator to the first element of the collection before reading the value of . 在调用 或 之前， 返回同一对象。 returns the same object until either or is called. 将 设置为下一个元素。 sets to the next element. 如果 越过集合的末尾，则枚举器将定位到集合中的最后一个元素之后， 返回 `false`。If passes the end of the collection, the enumerator is positioned after the last element in the collection and returns `false`. 当枚举器位于此位置时，对 的后续调用也将返回 `false`。When the enumerator is at this position, subsequent calls to also return `false`. 如果对的最后一个调用 返回 `false`，则调用 将引发异常。If the last call to returned `false`, calling throws an exception. 若要再次将 设置为集合的第一个元素，可以调用 并接着调用 。To set to the first element of the collection again, you can call followed by . 只要集合保持不变，枚举数就保持有效。An enumerator remains valid as long as the collection remains unchanged. 如果对集合所做的更改（如添加、修改或删除元素），则枚举器将失效且不可恢复，并且对 或 的下一个调用将引发 。If changes are made to the collection, such as adding, modifying, or deleting elements, the enumerator is irrecoverably invalidated and the next call to or throws an . 如果在 和 之间修改集合， 将返回其设置为的元素，即使枚举器已失效。If the collection is modified between and , returns the element that it is set to, even if the enumerator is already invalidated. 该枚举数不具有独占访问集合的权限；因此，枚举整个集合本质上不是一个线程安全的过程。The enumerator does not have exclusive access to the collection; therefore, enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 虽然 方法默认情况下对 COM 客户端不可见，但继承 类可以将其公开，并可能导致在 COM 客户端中产生不需要的行为。While the method is not visible to COM clients by default, inheriting the class can expose it and can cause undesirable behavior in COM clients. 此方法是一个 `O(1)` 操作。This method is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

summary.span: 清除 实例的内容时执行其他自定义进程。

span.span: Performs additional custom processes when clearing the contents of the instance.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现旨在由派生类重写，以在清除集合之前执行某些操作。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the collection is cleared. On \* 方法仅在 属性返回的实例上调用，而不是在 属性返回的实例上调用。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果进程失败，则集合恢复为其以前的状态。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 此方法的默认实现是 `O(1)` 操作。The default implementation of this method is an `O(1)` operation.

para.span: 此方法允许实施者定义在从基础 删除所有元素之前必须执行的过程。

span.span: This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed before deleting all the elements from the underlying .

para.span: 通过定义此方法，实施者可以向继承的方法添加功能，而无需重写所有其他方法。

span.span: By defining this method, implementers can add functionality to inherited methods without having to override all other methods.

para.span: 在标准清除行为之前调用，而 则在标准清楚行为之后调用。

span.span: is invoked before the standard Clear behavior, whereas is invoked after the standard Clear behavior.

para.span: 例如，实施者可以通过全局明文免除某些元素删除。

span.span: For example, implementers can exempt certain elements from deletion by a global Clear.

On \* 方法仅在 属性返回的实例上调用，而不是在 属性返回的实例上调用。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 此方法的默认实现是 `O(1)` 操作。The default implementation of this method is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现旨在由派生类重写，以便在插入指定元素后执行某一操作。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action after the specified element is inserted. On \* 方法仅在 属性返回的实例上调用，而不是在 属性返回的实例上调用。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果发生以下情况之一，则集合恢复为其以前的状态：The collection reverts back to its previous state if one of the following occurs: - 进程失败。The process fails. - 重写此方法以引发异常。This method is overridden to throw an exception. 此方法的默认实现是 `O(1)` 操作。The default implementation of this method is an `O(1)` operation.

para.span: 此方法允许实现者定义在将元素插入基础 后必须执行的过程。

span.span: This method allows implementers to define processes that must be performed after inserting the element into the underlying .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现旨在由派生类重写，以在删除指定元素之前执行某些操作。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action before the specified element is removed. On \* 方法仅在 属性返回的实例上调用，而不是在 属性返回的实例上调用。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果进程失败，则集合恢复为其以前的状态。If the process fails, the collection reverts back to its previous state. 此方法的默认实现是 `O(1)` 操作。The default implementation of this method is an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认实现旨在由派生类重写，以在删除指定元素后执行一些操作。The default implementation of this method is intended to be overridden by a derived class to perform some action after the specified element is removed. On \* 方法仅在 属性返回的实例上调用，而不是在 属性返回的实例上调用。The On\* methods are invoked only on the instance returned by the property, but not on the instance returned by the property. 如果发生以下情况之一，则集合恢复为其以前的状态：The collection reverts back to its previous state if one of the following occurs: - 进程失败。The process fails. - 重写此方法以引发异常。This method is overridden to throw an exception. 此方法的默认实现是 `O(1)` 操作。The default implementation of this method is an `O(1)` operation.

summary.span: 此方法不可重写。

span.span: This method is not overridable.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is .

span.span: is less than zero.
-or-
is equal to or greater than .

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized
ReadOnly Property IsSynchronized As Boolean Implements ICollection.IsSynchronized
property bool System::Collections::ICollection::IsSynchronized { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示是否同步对 的访问（线程安全）。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether access to the is synchronized (thread safe).

value.span: 如果对 的访问是同步的（线程安全），则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if access to the is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实例未同步。A instance is not synchronized. 派生类可以使用 属性提供 的同步版本。Derived classes can provide a synchronized version of the using the property. 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值是 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot { get; }
.property instance object System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot
ReadOnly Property SyncRoot As Object Implements ICollection.SyncRoot
property System::Object ^ System::Collections::ICollection::SyncRoot { System::Object ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

value.span: 可用于同步对 的访问的对象。

span.span: An object that can be used to synchronize access to the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 派生类可以使用 属性提供自己的 的同步版本。Derived classes can provide their own synchronized version of the using the property. 同步代码必须对 的 执行操作，而不是直接在 上执行操作。The synchronizing code must perform operations on the of the , not directly on the . 这样可确保对从其他对象派生的集合正确地执行操作。This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects. 具体而言，它与可能同时修改 对象的其他线程保持正确的同步。Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the object. 枚举集合本质上不是线程安全的过程。Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread safe procedure. 即使某个集合已同步，其他线程仍可以修改该集合，这会导致枚举数引发异常。Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads can still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception. 若要确保枚举过程中的线程安全性，可以在整个枚举期间锁定集合，或者捕获由其他线程进行的更改所导致的异常。To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads. 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 在整个枚举过程中锁定集合：The following code example shows how to lock the collection using the during the entire enumeration: [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/remarks.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/remarks.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/remarks.vb#2)] 检索此属性的值是 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

param.name: value
param.span: 要添加到 的结尾处的 。

span.span: Adds an object to the end of the .

returns.span: 已添加 的 索引。

span.span: The index at which the has been added.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 已经等于容量，则会自动重新分配内部数组，并将现有元素复制到新数组，然后再添加新元素，从而使列表的容量加倍。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array and copying the existing elements to the new array before the new element is added. 如果 小于容量，则此方法为 `O(1)` 操作。If is less than the capacity, this method is an `O(1)` operation. 如果需要增加容量以容纳新元素，则此方法将成为 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。If the capacity needs to be increased to accommodate the new element, this method becomes an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用 确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 从 .NET Framework 2.0 开始，此方法使用集合的对象的 并在 `item` 上 方法来确定 `item` 是否存在。Starting with the .NET Framework 2.0, this method uses the collection's objects' and methods on `item` to determine whether `item` exists. 在 .NET Framework 的早期版本中，此决定是使用集合中对象上的 `item` 参数的 和 方法进行的。In the earlier versions of the .NET Framework, this determination was made by using the and methods of the `item` parameter on the objects in the collection. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. MemberSignature.Value: void IList.Insert (int index, object value);
.method hidebysig newslot virtual instance void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int32 index, object value) cil managed
Sub Insert (index As Integer, value As Object) Implements IList.Insert
virtual void System.Collections.IList.Insert(int index, System::Object ^ value) = System::Collections::IList::Insert;

param.name: index
param.span: 应插入 的从零开始的索引。

span.span: The zero-based index at which should be inserted.

param.name: value
param.span: 要插入的 。

span.span: The to insert.

summary.span: 将元素插入 的指定索引处。

span.span: Inserts an element into the at the specified index.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 已经等于容量，则会在插入新元素之前自动重新分配内部数组，以将列表的容量加倍。If already equals the capacity, the capacity of the list is doubled by automatically reallocating the internal array before the new element is inserted. 如果 `index` 等于 ，则 `value` 添加到 的末尾。If `index` is equal to , `value` is added to the end of . 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，插入点下面的元素将下移以容纳新的元素。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the insertion point move down to accommodate the new element. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. 此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. [!code-cpp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CPP/collectionbase.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/CS/collectionbase.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Collections.CollectionBase#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.Collections.CollectionBase/VB/collectionbase.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsFixedSize
ReadOnly Property IsFixedSize As Boolean Implements IList.IsFixedSize
property bool System::Collections::IList::IsFixedSize { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否具有固定大小。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the has a fixed size.

value.span: 如果 具有固定大小，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the has a fixed size; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 具有固定大小的集合在创建之后不能再添加或移除元素，但是允许修改现有元素。A collection with a fixed size does not allow the addition or removal of elements after the collection is created, but it allows the modification of existing elements. 具有固定大小的集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止添加和移除元素的包装;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，包括添加或删除元素，则固定大小的集合将反映这些更改。A collection with a fixed size is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents adding and removing elements; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, including the addition or removal of elements, the fixed-size collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值是 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

MemberSignature.Value: bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly { get; }
.property instance bool System.Collections.IList.IsReadOnly
ReadOnly Property IsReadOnly As Boolean Implements IList.IsReadOnly
property bool System::Collections::IList::IsReadOnly { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示 是否为只读。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在创建只读集合后，该集合不允许添加、移除或修改元素。A collection that is read-only does not allow the addition, removal, or modification of elements after the collection is created. 只读集合就是一个集合，其中包含阻止修改集合的包装器;因此，如果对基础集合进行了更改，只读集合将反映这些更改。A collection that is read-only is simply a collection with a wrapper that prevents modifying the collection; therefore, if changes are made to the underlying collection, the read-only collection reflects those changes. 检索此属性的值是 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用下面的语法通过此属性访问集合中的特定元素：`myCollection[index]`。This property provides the ability to access a specific element in the collection by using the following syntax: `myCollection[index]`. 检索此属性的值是一个 `O(1)` 操作;设置属性也是 `O(1)` 操作。Retrieving the value of this property is an `O(1)` operation; setting the property is also an `O(1)` operation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects. summary.span: 从 中移除特定对象的第一个匹配项。

span.span: Removes the first occurrence of a specific object from the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果 不包含指定的对象，则 保持不变。If the does not contain the specified object, the remains unchanged. 不引发异常。No exception is thrown. 此方法执行线性搜索;因此，此方法是 `O(n)` 操作，其中 `n` 是 的。This method performs a linear search; therefore, this method is an `O(n)` operation, where `n` is . 此方法通过调用 确定相等性。This method determines equality by calling . 在由连续的元素组成的集合（如列表）中，已移除元素下面的元素将上移以占据空出的位置。In collections of contiguous elements, such as lists, the elements that follow the removed element move up to occupy the vacated spot. 如果集合具有索引，则移动的元素的索引也将更新。If the collection is indexed, the indexes of the elements that are moved are also updated. 此行为不适用于元素按概念划分为不同存储桶的集合，如哈希表。This behavior does not apply to collections where elements are conceptually grouped into buckets, such as a hash table. ## Examples 下面的代码示例实现 类，并使用该实现创建 对象的集合。The following code example implements the class and uses that implementation to create a collection of objects.
